original_text: And he went his way, and communed with the chief priests and captains, how he might betray him unto them.
korean_text: 이에 유다가 대제사장들과 성전 경비대장들에게 가서 예수를 넘겨 줄 방도를 의논하매

sentences.original_text: and communed with the chief priests and captains
how he might betray him unto them
sentences.korean_translation: 자기가 그들을 위해 그를 배신할 방법을
